nodes.text: Helix Three was the callsign assigned to the third member of Helix Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, a female Imperial TIE fighter pilot using this callsign participated in a battle at Fostar Haven.

Helix Three was the callsign used by an Imperial non-player character in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons. In the game, this character spoke one or more random lines depending on the situation, which included "I'm hit!", "Taking enemy fire!", "Under fire!", "You're clear!".
